name: Video Voyeur #4: Kelly Clarkson Trivia Game | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which one of Kelly's videos showed her running through the woods in a wedding gown and falling in the mud?
questions.explanation:
Behind These Hazel Eyes.

	"Behind These Hazel Eyes" was one of Kelly's darkest video in that the video takes place in the woods at night and then in a dark church.

questions.text: Which video showed Kelly walking through a trashed house stepping over passed out teenagers?
questions.explanation:
Miss Independent.

	Kelly's video for "Miss Independent" finished second in the Fandango Video Countdown for cheesy videos.

questions.text: Kelly teased her boyfriend by threatening to throw out his goldfish. In which one of Kelly's videos did this occur?
questions.correct: My Life Would Suck Without You
questions.explanation:
My Life Would Suck Without You.

	"My Life Would Suck Without You" starred Houston Rhimes as Kelly's boyfriend. The video, directed by Wayne Isham, was filmed in December 2008 in Los Angeles. Kelly's first video from her new CD was previewed on the January 29, 2009 episode of "American Idol".

questions.text: Kelly's video for "Breakaway" showed Kelly's ex-boyfriend seeing her at the airport, but then she disappeared.
questions.explanation:
False.

	The scene mentioned above was from Kelly's video "Never Again". The video shoot took two days in April to shoot and was directed by Joseph Kahn. When interviewed about the video, Kelly remarked "that the video was slightly reminiscent of 'What Lies Beneath' with Harrison Ford".

questions.text: Time froze before Kelly's on screen husband smashed a picture of them as a family. In which video did this action take place?
questions.explanation:
Because of You.

	The video as well as the song was written by Kelly Clarkson. The younger version of Kelly was acted by Kennedy Noel, daughter of Kelly's keyboard player Jason Halbert. Kelly debuted the video at TRL on October 3, 2005. The video won Best Female Video.

questions.text: Kelly's video for this song showed ordinary people singing the lyrics to this song while in different circumstances. Which video is it?
options: My Life Would Suck Without You
questions.explanation:
Walk Away.

	The video for "Walk Away" was written by Kelly Clarkson. The video shoot lasted two days and the video premiered in March of 2006. "Walk Away" made VH1's top 40 videos of 2006.

questions.text: Which one of Kelly's videos had scenes of "Princess Diaries 2" in the video?
options: My Life Would Suck Without You
questions.explanation:
Breakaway.

	The video for "Breakaway" was made with scenes from "Princess Diaries 2" in the video because Kelly's song was featured in the movie. The video for the song had Kelly arriving at a paparazzi filled red carpet for the movie's fake premiere.

questions.text: Which one of Kelly's videos showed her fantasizing about the waiter while at a dinner party?
questions.explanation:
I Do Not Hook Up.

	"I Do Not Hook Up" was filmed on March 25, 2009 and directed by Bryan Barber. The video was leaked to MTV on April 18th before its official release date on April 20th. The waiter that took part in Kelly's fantasy was played by Lee Kholafai.

questions.text: In which one of Kelly's videos did she destroy her ex-boyfriend's apartment by trashing photos, slitting couch cushions, and throwing clothes all over the floor?
questions.explanation:
Since U Been Gone.

	"Since U Been Gone" was a typical boyfriend revenge video. The video won Best Female Video and Best Pop Video at the 2003 MTV awards.

questions.text: Kelly's very first video showed scenes of her time on "American Idol". What was her very first video called?
questions.correct: A Moment Like This& Moment like this
questions.explanation:
A Moment Like This& Moment like this.

	Kelly Clarkson entered a theater and sang on stage while clips from her audition on "American Idol" to her winning moment were shown while she sang "A Moment Like This".
